## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G26360](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G26360)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>bS21m</u>
- **Gene Name:** Ribosomal Protein bS21m
- **Description:**   Ribosomal protein S21 family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
